game.shortDescriptionEn: ğŸ¥•ğŸ¥”ğŸŒ½ğŸ‘‘ Feed the King! Agrivore is an incremental farming roguelike where you equip magical farming gear, harvest crops, unlock new equipment, and create hyper combos in your skill tree. Harvest the most crops to feed them to your gluttonous King.
